lead_paragraph: A sheriff who resigned after using an inmate to build a party shed at his home is asking voters in Saluda County to trust him with a second chance.

headline.main: In Small SC County, Shamed Sheriff Asks for 2nd Chance
headline.print_headline: In Small SC County, Shamed Sheriff Asks for 2nd Chance

snippet: A sheriff who resigned after using an inmate to build a party shed at his home is asking voters in Saluda County to trust him with a second chance.
